item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔认为银行将更多地利用再融资操作
item.description: 欧洲央行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）表示，随着政策制定者的债券储量减少，欧元区的贷款人今后可能会更频繁地向欧洲央行寻求资金。【原文：Lenders in the euro zone are likely to turn to the European Central Bank for funding more frequently in the future as policymakers’ stash of bonds is reduced, according to Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel.】

item.title: 日产汽车下调业绩展望，宣布重组并裁员 9000 人
item.description: 日产汽车公司下调了年度利润展望，宣布计划裁员 9000 人，并将产能减少 20%，以应对主要市场销售恶化的局面。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. lowered its annual profit outlook, announced plans to cut 9,000 jobs and reduce capacity by 20%, as it seeks to cope with deteriorating sales in major markets.】

item.title: iShares比特币ETF交易量创纪录，加密货币历史性上涨再添动力
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）承诺将美国置于数字资产行业的中心，这一承诺正在重塑加密货币市场。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump’s pledge to put the US at the center of the digital-asset industry is reshaping the crypto market.】

item.title: 美国收益率飙升向特朗普发出信息：债券守夜人觉醒了
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普在美国总统大选中大获全胜，在华尔街掀起了一股买入信号的洪流。然而，有一个明显的例外。【原文：Donald Trump’s sweeping win in the US presidential election set off a torrent of buy-signals across Wall Street. There was, however, one notable exception.】

item.title: 英国电信因业务部门前景黯淡下调 2025 年收入预测
item.description: 英国电信集团（BT Group Plc）下调了公司 2025 财年的收入指导，原因是首席执行官艾利森-柯克比（Allison Kirkby）正在实施一项重大的扭亏计划，业务部门前景黯淡。【原文：BT Group Plc lowered the company’s 2025 fiscal year revenue guidance due to a weak outlook for its business department, as Chief Executive Officer Allison Kirkby implements a major turnaround plan.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）通过剔除更多股票降低中国在衡量指标中的比重
item.description: 摩根斯坦利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc. 在中国政府的刺激政策未能阻止中国股市在地区基准中的地位下降后，进一步削减了中国股票的比重，尽管该公司将更多的印度股票纳入其衡量标准。【原文：MSCI Inc. further trimmed Chinese stocks after Beijing’s stimulus blitz failed to halt the market’s diminishing presence in regional benchmarks, even as it added more Indian equities to its measures.】

item.title: 中国市场持续疲软，资生堂下调全年业绩预期
item.description: 日本化妆品巨头资生堂株式会社（Shiseido Co.【原文：Shiseido Co. slashed its profit outlook for the year as the Japanese cosmetics giant reported a plunge in net income amid a persistent slump in the key Chinese market.】

item.title: 汽车公司正与银行洽谈至少 5 亿美元贷款事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国最大的汽车租赁公司之一易车公司正在与银行商讨潜在的银团贷款事宜。【原文：Car Inc., one of China’s biggest car rental firms, is in discussion with banks for a potential syndicated loan, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿迪恩净营收不及预期，销量增长放缓
item.description: Adyen NV 的净收入低于分析师预期，原因是该支付公司第三季度的交易量增长放缓。【原文：Adyen NV’s net revenue fell short of analyst expectations, as the payment firm’s volume growth decelerated in the third quarter.】

item.title: 关税威胁影响经济复苏，德国工业产值下降
item.description: 德国 9 月份的工业生产出现下滑，这给人们对该国工厂萧条可能触底反弹的希望浇了一盆冷水。【原文：German industrial production declined in September, pouring cold water on hopes that the country’s factory slump may be bottoming out.】

item.title: 快递英雄预计 2024 年盈利将低于此前预测
item.description: Delivery Hero SE 下调了今年的利润预期，这表明该公司在竞争激烈的食品配送市场进行战略调整时遇到了压力。【原文：Delivery Hero SE tempered profit expectations for the year, a sign of strain in the company’s strategic overhaul in the competitive food delivery market.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯称英国 10 月房价攀升至历史新高
item.description: 据一家领先的抵押贷款机构称，英国 10 月份的房价创下了历史新高，这表明在工党本月底发布预算案之前，更低廉的抵押贷款所带来的推动力消除了购房者的忧虑。【原文：UK house prices hit record levels in October, according to a leading mortgage lender, suggesting the boost from cheaper mortgages defied any pre-budget anxieties homebuyers had ahead of Labour’s budget at the end of the month.】

item.title: 力拓集团高层呼吁特朗普加快审批速度
item.description: 力拓集团首席商务官 Bold Baatar 呼吁美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普彻底改革亚利桑那州 Resolution 铜矿的审批程序。【原文：Rio Tinto Group Chief Commercial Officer Bold Baatar has called on US President-elect Donald Trump to overhaul approvals processing for its Resolution copper mine in Arizona.】

item.title: 欧洲黑暗无风的日子显示其可再生能源推广的风险
item.description: 本周，欧洲电价飙升至能源危机期间的最高水平。只不过，造成这种情况的不是战争或其他地缘政治事件，而是冬季常见的阴暗无风天气。【原文：Europe’s power prices soared to levels last seen during the energy crisis this week. Only it wasn’t a war or other geopolitical events that caused it, but the dark, windless weather that is all too common during winter.】

item.title: 德国政治动荡的核心--6,500 亿欧元的资金外流
item.description:
德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）的分裂联盟竭力阻止大规模资本外流，而唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）连任后，资本外流有可能加速。【原文：

Chancellor Olaf Scholz’s fractious coalition struggled to stem a massive capital drain, which threatens to accelerate after Donald Trump’s re-election.

】

item.title: 中国股市因政策希望和乐观的贸易数据而反弹
item.description: 中国股市反弹，扭转了早盘的跌势，原因是强劲的出口和对更多刺激经济增长措施的希望超过了对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）再次担任总统带来的贸易摩擦的担忧。【原文：Chinese shares rallied, reversing early losses as robust exports and hopes for more growth stimulus outweighed concerns over trade frictions posed by a second Donald Trump presidency.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑在英国央行重要决议前收复失地
隆基计划利用先进技术新建太阳能工厂
item.description: 中国一家领先的太阳能制造商宣布，计划在中国西南地区新建一家工厂，并打赌继续推进该行业的技术发展将超过在已经饱和的市场上再增加一家工厂所带来的风险。【原文：A leading Chinese solar manufacturer announced plans for a new factory in Southwest China, in a bet that continuing to advance technology in the sector will outweigh the risks of adding to an already saturated market.】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔呼吁采取贸易措施应对中国出口
item.description: 安赛乐米塔尔公司（ArcelorMittal SA）呼吁采取更强有力的贸易措施，以应对中国钢铁出口泛滥的问题。【原文：ArcelorMittal SA called for stronger trade measures to address a flood of Chinese steel exports that it says are making the market is unsustainable, with prices in Europe well below marginal costs.】

item.title: 印度股票交易价值创一年来新低
item.description: 印度股票现货交易价值跌至近一年来的最低水平，此前当地市场出现大范围抛售，接近调整水平。【原文：The value of equity cash trading in India fell to the lowest level in almost a year after a broader selloff took the local market near correction levels.】

item.title: 中国石油进口再次下降，第一大买家减少进口
item.description: 就在交易商权衡唐纳德-特朗普入主白宫和欧佩克+可能增加供应量的影响之际，中国上个月的石油进口量再次下滑，凸显出这个最大买家的消费疲软。【原文：Oil imports into China sank again last month, highlighting soft consumption in the largest buyer just as traders weighed the implications of Donald Trump capturing the White House and potential supply rises from OPEC+.】

item.title: 据说马来西亚大亨林氏将考虑出售收费公路资产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，马来西亚富豪林康和正在探讨出售其收费公路业务，这笔交易的资产价值可能高达 50 亿林吉特（约合 11 亿美元）。【原文：Malaysian tycoon Lim Kang Hoo is exploring selling his toll road business in a deal that could value the assets at as much as 5 billion ringgit ($1.1 billion), according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 亚洲货币交易员为风险做好准备 美联储和中国的表现令人失望
item.description: 亚洲货币交易商刚刚从周三的大跌中恢复过来，但他们已经开始缩手缩脚，以应对即将到来的下一个宏观风险。【原文：Asian currency traders have barely recovered from Wednesday’s selloff but they’re already hunkering down for the next macro risks on the horizon.】

item.title: 特朗普交易仍未定价的地方
item.description:
随着内阁人选、关税摩擦和海外意外事件的逐渐浮出水面，我们还有很大的发展空间。【原文：

There’s plenty of room to run as Cabinet picks, tariff frictions, and overseas surprises take shape.

】

item.title: 通胀缓解，塞尔维亚有望降息：决策指南
item.description: 塞尔维亚可能会利用总体通胀缓解的迹象将利率降至近两年来的最低水平，此前政策制定者在上个月维持了基准利率。【原文：Serbia may take advantage of signs headline inflation is easing to cut interest rates to the lowest level in almost two years after policymakers held the benchmark last month.】

item.title: 捷克人将降息，因为前路布满风险：决策指南
item.description: 由于目前经济增长疲软压倒了对通胀风险的担忧，捷克政策制定者可能会继续连续第八次降息。【原文：Czech policymakers will likely press on with an eighth consecutive interest-rate cut as weak economic growth for now trumps concerns about inflationary risks.】

item.title: 波兰建立国有电动汽车制造商的时间不多了
item.description: 波兰为建立自己的电动汽车品牌所做的努力已无路可走，该国家支持项目的一位高层管理人员警告说，其中国合作伙伴可能会因缺乏资金而退出。【原文：Poland’s effort to establish its own electric car brand is running out of road, with a top executive for the state-backed project warning that its Chinese partner may walk over a lack of funding.】

item.title: 市场关注刺激政策，中国大宗商品进口保持韧性
item.description: 周四公布的海关数据显示，由于需求在经济放缓的情况下依然保持弹性，10月份中国原材料进口大部分同比增长。【原文：Chinese raw materials imports mostly rose year-on-year in October, according to customs data released Thursday, as demand remained resilient despite a slowing economy.】

item.title: 中国要求银行下调同业存款利率以促进经济增长
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国监管机构要求中国的银行降低对其他金融机构存款的利率，以腾出资金促进经济发展。【原文：Chinese regulators told the nation’s banks to lower rates they paid to deposits from other financial institutions to free up funds to boost the economy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普的中国威胁令投资者青睐印度和日本股市
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在大选中获胜，被认为改变了亚洲三大股市近期的资金流向，因为关税风险笼罩着中国资产。【原文：Donald Trump’s election victory is seen changing the course of near-term money flows for three of Asia’s largest equity markets as tariff risks loom large over Chinese assets.】
